languages.text: "Вы же прилетели", {n}— улыбается Эвейн.{/n} "Я... сомневался, конечно. Но я не губернатор Медина, чтобы отсиживаться в бункере. Хотел сделать хоть что-то и подумал, что прибытие с маленьким эскортом покажет Анатагону искренность моих намерений. Появись я тут во главе целого отряда — было бы больше похоже на десант".

"So did you." {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "I... had my doubts, of course. But I am not Governor Medineh. I refuse to sit idle in the safety of a bunker. I wanted to do something, and I thought arriving with a light escort would show Anathagon the sincerity of my intentions. Had I arrived at the head of a whole unit, I would not fault An for assuming this was an assault."
languages.original_text: "Вы же прилетели", {n}— улыбается Эвейн.{/n} "Я... сомневался, конечно. Но я не губернатор Медина, чтобы отсиживаться в бункере. Хотел сделать хоть что-то и подумал, что прибытие с маленьким эскортом покажет Анатагону искренность моих намерений. Появись я тут во главе целого отряда — было бы больше похоже на десант".

traits.locale_text: "So did you." {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "I... had my doubts, of course. But I am not Governor Medineh to be sitting in the safety of a bunker. I wanted to do something, and I thought arriving with a light escort would show Anathagon the sincerity of my intentions. Had I come at the head of a troop, it would have looked more like an assault force."

"So did you." {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "I... had my doubts, of course. But I am not Governor Medineh to be sitting in the safety of a bunker. I wanted to do something, and I thought arriving with a light escort would show Anathagon the sincerity of my intentions. Had I come at the head of a troop, it would have looked more like an assault force."

"So did you." {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "I... had my doubts, of course. But I am not Governor Medineh. I refuse to sit idle in the safety of a bunker. I wanted to do something, and I thought arriving with a light escort would show Anathagon the sincerity of my intentions. Had I arrived at the head of a whole unit, I would not fault An for assuming this was an assault."

"So did you." {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "I... had my doubts, of course. But I am not Governor Medineh. I refuse to sit idle in the safety of a bunker. I wanted to do something, and I thought arriving with a light escort would show Anathagon the sincerity of my intentions. Had I arrived at the head of a whole unit, I would not fault An for assuming this was an assault."

"So did you." {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "I... had my doubts, of course. But I am not Governor Medineh. I refuse to sit idle in the safety of a bunker. I wanted to do something, and I thought arriving with a light escort would show Anathagon the sincerity of my intentions. Had I arrived at the head of a whole unit, I would not fault An for assuming this was an assault."

"So did you." {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "I... had my doubts, of course. But I am not Governor Medineh. I refuse to sit idle in the safety of a bunker. I wanted to do something, and I thought arriving with a light escort would show Anathagon the sincerity of my intentions. Had I arrived at the head of a whole unit, I would not fault An for assuming this was an assault."

languages.text: «Usted ha hecho lo mismo». {n}Evayne sonríe.{/n} «Yo... tenía mis dudas, por supuesto. Pero no soy como el gobernador Medineh. Me niego a recluirme en un búnker. Deseaba hacer algo al respecto, y consideré que llegar con un reducido grupo de escoltas demostraría a Anathagon que mis intenciones son honestas. Si hubiera llegado liderando todo un ejército, entendería que An creyese que se trataba de un asalto».
languages.original_text: "So did you." {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "I... had my doubts, of course. But I am not Governor Medineh. I refuse to sit idle in the safety of a bunker. I wanted to do something, and I thought arriving with a light escort would show Anathagon the sincerity of my intentions. Had I arrived at the head of a whole unit, I would not fault An for assuming this was an assault."

traits.locale_text: «Usted ha hecho lo mismo». {n}Evayne sonríe.{/n} «Yo... tenía mis dudas, por supuesto. Pero no soy como el gobernador Medineh. Me niego a recluirme en un búnker. Deseaba hacer algo al respecto, y consideré que llegar con un reducido grupo de escoltas demostraría a Anathagon que mis intenciones son honestas. Si hubiera llegado liderando todo un ejército, entendería que An creyese que se trataba de un asalto».

languages.text: "Ihr doch ebenso." {n}Evayne lächelt.{/n} "Ich ... hatte natürlich so meine Zweifel. Aber ich bin nicht Gouverneur Medineh. Ich weigere mich, untätig in einem sicheren Bunker herumzusitzen. Ich wollte etwas tun, und ich dachte, wenn ich mit einer leichten Eskorte komme, zeigt das Anathagon die Aufrichtigkeit meiner Absichten. Wäre ich an der Spitze einer ganzen Einheit erschienen, könnte ich es An nicht verübeln, wenn er das für einen Angriff hält."
languages.original_text: "So did you." {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "I... had my doubts, of course. But I am not Governor Medineh. I refuse to sit idle in the safety of a bunker. I wanted to do something, and I thought arriving with a light escort would show Anathagon the sincerity of my intentions. Had I arrived at the head of a whole unit, I would not fault An for assuming this was an assault."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr doch ebenso." {n}Evayne lächelt.{/n} "Ich ... hatte natürlich so meine Zweifel. Aber ich bin nicht Gouverneur Medineh. Ich weigere mich, untätig in einem sicheren Bunker herumzusitzen. Ich wollte etwas tun, und ich dachte, wenn ich mit einer leichten Eskorte komme, zeigt das Anathagon die Aufrichtigkeit meiner Absichten. Wäre ich an der Spitze einer ganzen Einheit erschienen, könnte ich es An nicht verübeln, wenn er das für einen Angriff hält."

languages.text: « Vous en avez fait de même. {n}Evayne sourit.{/n} Je... j'ai eu des doutes, bien sûr. Mais je ne suis pas le gouverneur Medineh. Je refuse de rester assis sans rien faire, bien à l'abri dans un bunker. Je voulais agir, et j'ai pensé qu'en arrivant avec une escorte réduite, Anathagon verrait que j'étais sincère dans mes intentions. Si j'avais débarqué à la tête d'un contingent entier, je n'aurais pas pu en vouloir à An de croire à une attaque. »
languages.original_text: "So did you." {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "I... had my doubts, of course. But I am not Governor Medineh. I refuse to sit idle in the safety of a bunker. I wanted to do something, and I thought arriving with a light escort would show Anathagon the sincerity of my intentions. Had I arrived at the head of a whole unit, I would not fault An for assuming this was an assault."

traits.locale_text: « Vous en avez fait de même. {n}Evayne sourit.{/n} Je... j'ai eu des doutes, bien sûr. Mais je ne suis pas le gouverneur Medineh. Je refuse de rester assis sans rien faire, bien à l'abri dans un bunker. Je voulais agir, et j'ai pensé qu'en arrivant avec une escorte réduite, Anathagon verrait que j'étais sincère dans mes intentions. Si j'avais débarqué à la tête d'un contingent entier, je n'aurais pas pu en vouloir à An de croire à une attaque. »

languages.text: “您也一样。”{n}艾维尼微笑着。{/n}“当然，我……也曾有过疑虑，但我和梅迪涅总督不同。我不想呆在安全的地堡里无所事事，我想有所作为。我认为只有轻装前来，才能让安纳塔贡看到我此行的诚意。如果我带着整支部队冲过来，恐怕只会让他产生误会，以为我要发起进攻。”
languages.original_text: "So did you." {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "I... had my doubts, of course. But I am not Governor Medineh. I refuse to sit idle in the safety of a bunker. I wanted to do something, and I thought arriving with a light escort would show Anathagon the sincerity of my intentions. Had I arrived at the head of a whole unit, I would not fault An for assuming this was an assault."

traits.locale_text: “您也一样。”{n}艾维尼微笑着。{/n}“当然，我……也曾有过疑虑，但我和梅迪涅总督不同。我不想呆在安全的地堡里无所事事，我想有所作为。我认为只有轻装前来，才能让安纳塔贡看到我此行的诚意。如果我带着整支部队冲过来，恐怕只会让他产生误会，以为我要发起进攻。”

languages.text: 「それはあなたもだろう」{n}エヴァインは微笑む。{/n}「もちろん…俺にも疑問はあった。だが俺はメディネ総督ではない。安全なバンカーの中でただ安穏としているだけなんてゴメンだ。何かをしたかった。そして少数の護衛を付けたうえで訪ねれば、アナサゴンに誠意を示せると思った。もしも部隊をゾロゾロと引き連れて現れでもしたら、アンに襲撃だと思われても仕方ないだろう」
languages.original_text: "So did you." {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "I... had my doubts, of course. But I am not Governor Medineh. I refuse to sit idle in the safety of a bunker. I wanted to do something, and I thought arriving with a light escort would show Anathagon the sincerity of my intentions. Had I arrived at the head of a whole unit, I would not fault An for assuming this was an assault."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたもか」{n}エヴァインは微笑む。{/n}「もちろん…俺も疑問には思っていた。だが俺はメディネ総督ではない。安全な砦で何もせず座っているなんてゴメンだ。何かしたくて、最低限の護衛で現れれば、アナサゴンに誠意を示せるかと思ってね。軍をゾロゾロと引き連れて現れでもしたら、アンが襲撃だと思い込んでも責められないさ」
「それはあなたもだろう」{n}エヴァインは微笑む。{/n}「もちろん…俺にも疑問はあった。だが俺はメディネ総督ではない。安全なバンカーの中でただ安穏としているだけなんてゴメンだ。何かをしたかった。そして少数の護衛を付けたうえで訪ねれば、アナサゴンに誠意を示せると思った。もしも部隊をゾロゾロと引き連れて現れでもしたら、アンに襲撃だと思われても仕方ないだろう」

languages.text: "E siz de kalabalık değilsiniz." {n}Evayne gülümsüyor.{/n} "Şüphelerim... Oldu elbette ama ben Vali Medineh değilim. Emniyetli bir sığınakta boş boş oturmam. Bir şeyler yapmak istedim. Küçük bir refakatçi ekibiyle gelmenin, Anathagon'a niyetimin samimiyetini göstereceğini düşündüm. Yanımda koca bir bölükle gelmiş olsam An, haklı olarak bunun bir saldırı olduğunu düşünebilirdi."
languages.original_text: "So did you." {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "I... had my doubts, of course. But I am not Governor Medineh. I refuse to sit idle in the safety of a bunker. I wanted to do something, and I thought arriving with a light escort would show Anathagon the sincerity of my intentions. Had I arrived at the head of a whole unit, I would not fault An for assuming this was an assault."

traits.locale_text: "E siz de kalabalık değilsiniz." {n}Evayne gülümsüyor.{/n} "Şüphelerim... Oldu elbette ama ben Vali Medineh değilim. Emniyetli bir sığınakta boş boş oturmam. Bir şeyler yapmak istedim. Küçük bir refakatçi ekibiyle gelmenin, Anathagon'a niyetimin samimiyetini göstereceğini düşündüm. Yanımda koca bir bölükle gelmiş olsam An, haklı olarak bunun bir saldırı olduğunu düşünebilirdi."
